backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing artist profiles, media uploads, donation handling, and Stripe integration with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions establishing light/dark theme color tokens and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entrypoint loading the root React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, theming, and top-level application routes including landing, browse, artist, dashboard, and payment pages.
frontend/src/components/artist/ArtistOnb: Modal form allowing artists to create or update profiles with avatar upload, bio, links, and validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/donations/Donate: Donation dialog that collects amount, optional name and message, then creates a Stripe checkout session and redirects the user.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level layout component rendering header, footer, and main content region.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying copyright info and a referral link with branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation links, authentication button, and mobile menu.
Displays a media item with thumbnail, artist info, tags, and an optional donate button with dialog.
Grid layout wrapper for displaying media cards.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaUploa: Form allowing artists to upload media files with metadata and track upload progress.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchBar: Search input field with an icon and change handler.
frontend/src/components/stripe/StripeCon: Card interface for connecting, viewing, or revoking an artist’s Stripe access token.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating artist, media, and related backend data using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles, theme variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up query and identity providers around the root component.
frontend/src/pages/artist/ArtistPage.tsx: Displays an artist profile with avatar, bio, links, and their uploaded media, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/browse/CategoryBrowse: Displays media for a selected category with search filtering and category-specific metadata.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/ArtistDashb: Shows the authenticated artist’s dashboard, onboarding flow, and tabs for overview, media, and donations.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardDo: Displays donation stats and media-based donation breakdown, currently showing placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardHo: Shows the artist’s profile, quick stats, external links, and provides profile editing.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardMe: Lets artists upload, view, and delete their media with category labels and tags.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, media categories, and recent media with authentication-aware actions.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Shows a cancelled payment message with navigation options back to home or browsing.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Shows a successful payment message and invalidates related queries before offering navigation options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the platform’s purpose, current features, architecture notes, and required images.
